result.title: Week 7 â€” 1 week break went longer
result.content:
Keeping a resolution is way harder than I expected. After finishing the recital, I found that I have 2 Science finals and a Math final to study for, and then things dragged on. After 1.5 weeks, it got difficult to get back. I was afraid of condescending message about how I was not inconsistent. But, my goal is more important.

Well, let's get back on track! This will be a week of data structure. 2/12: Heaps Day 1! Understand what it is. 2/13: Heaps Day 2! Try 1 problem with it. 2/14: Heaps Day 3! Find 2 problems from P-Set and do them. 2/16: SegTree Day 1! Understand what it is. 2/17: SegTree Day 2! Try 1 problem with it. 2/18: SegTree Day 3! Find 2 problems from P-Set and do them. 2/19: Additional practice with the 2 data structures.
